docs.title: How to Connect Raffl.online to Your PayPal Account
docs.text: Raffl.online integrates directly with your PayPal account. To enable this integration, you’ll need your Paypal business email address, Client ID and Client Secret.

docs.title: Paypal Business Email Address
docs.text: The Paypal business email address is the primary address associated with the Paypal account. It is also typically used to log into Paypal.

docs.title: Retrieving your PayPal credentials:
docs.text:
1. Go to the PayPal Developer Dashboard (Live) and log in with your PayPal account.
  2. Check if you already have an existing app listed.
    • If yes, click on the app name to view the Client ID and Client Secret.
    • You can send these credentials to me once located.
  3. If you don’t see an existing app:
    • Click “Create App”.
    • When prompted, select “Merchant” as the app type.
    • Enter a name for your app (e.g., “Raffl Integration”) and click “Create App”.
    • Once the app is created, you’ll be shown your Client ID and Client Secret.

⚠️ Make sure you are creating the app under the Live tab (not Sandbox), as Raffl.online uses live PayPal credentials.
